text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = Pambio Noranco | settlement_type = Quarter | native_name = | image_map = Karte Quartier Pambio Noranco 2013.png | image_shield = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Switzerland | subdivision_type1 = Canton | subdivision_name1 = Ticino | subdivision_type2 = District | subdivision_name2 = Lugano | subdivision_type3 = City | subdivision_name3 = Lugano | area_total_km2 = 0.6 | area_footnotes = | population_as_of = 2012-12-31 | population_total = 701 | population_footnotes = | population_density_km2 = auto }} Pambio-Noranco is a quarter of the city of Lugano, Switzerland. Until 2004 it was a municipality on its own. Then it was added to Lugano. == Villages == * Noranco * Pambio == References == == Other websites == * Official Pambio Noranco quarter website Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:Neighbourhoods in Lugano
title: Pambio-Noranco
